languages.text: К несчастью, среди обитателей мира преобладали высокородные дворяне, серфов же почти не было. Не желая марать руки грязной работой, аристократы начали закупать невольников у пиратов, и вскоре Новый Райкад стал любимой безопасной гаванью пустотных разбойников.

Sadly, the world's inhabitants mostly consisted of high-born nobles, with very few serfs. Not willing to sully their hands with manual labour, the aristocrats started buying up pirate captives. Soon, New Rykad became the favoured safe haven for void outlaws.
languages.original_text: К несчастью, среди обитателей мира преобладали высокородные дворяне, серфов же почти не было. Не желая марать руки грязной работой, аристократы начали закупать невольников у пиратов, и вскоре Новый Райкад стал любимой безопасной гаванью пустотных разбойников.

traits.locale_text: Sadly, the world's inhabitants mostly consisted of high-born nobles, with very few serfs. Not willing to dirty their hands with manual labour, aristocrats started buying pirate captives. Soon, New Rykad became the favoured safe harbour for void brigands.

Sadly, the world's inhabitants mostly consisted of high-born nobles, with very few serfs. Not willing to sully their hands with manual labour, the aristocrats started buying up pirate captives. Soon, New Rykad became the favoured safe haven for void outlaws.

Sadly, the world's inhabitants mostly consisted of high-born nobles, with very few serfs. Not willing to sully their hands with manual labour, the aristocrats started buying up pirate captives. Soon, New Rykad became the favoured safe haven for void outlaws.

languages.text: 遗憾的是，这个世界上的绝大部分居民都是出身高贵的贵族，鲜有仆役，而且这些贵族不愿意亲自进行体力劳动，于是他们开始购买海盗的俘虏。没过多久，新莱卡德就成了无法无天的亡命之徒所青睐的避风港。
languages.original_text: Sadly, the world's inhabitants mostly consisted of high-born nobles, with very few serfs. Not willing to sully their hands with manual labour, the aristocrats started buying up pirate captives. Soon, New Rykad became the favoured safe haven for void outlaws.

traits.locale_text: 遗憾的是，这个世界上的绝大部分居民都是出身高贵的贵族，鲜有仆役，而且这些贵族不愿意身体力行进行体力劳动，于是他们开始购买海盗的俘虏。没过多久，新莱卡德就成了无法无天的亡命之徒所青睐的避风港。

languages.text: Bedauerlichweise bestanden die Bewohner der Welt hauptsächlich aus hochwohlgeborenen Adligen, mit nur sehr wenigen Sklaven. Da die Aristokraten nicht bereit waren, sich die Hände mit niederen Tätigkeiten schmutzig zu machen, fingen sie an, gefangene Piraten zu kaufen. New Rykad wurde bald zum bevorzugten sicheren Hafen aller Gesetzlosen der Leere.
languages.original_text: Sadly, the world's inhabitants mostly consisted of high-born nobles, with very few serfs. Not willing to sully their hands with manual labour, the aristocrats started buying up pirate captives. Soon, New Rykad became the favoured safe haven for void outlaws.

traits.locale_text: Bedauerlichweise bestanden die Bewohner der Welt hauptsächlich aus hochwohlgeborenen Adligen, mit nur sehr wenigen Sklaven. Da die Aristokraten nicht bereit waren, sich die Hände mit niederen Tätigkeiten schmutzig zu machen, fingen sie an, gefangene Piraten zu kaufen. New Rykad wurde bald zum bevorzugten sicheren Hafen aller Gesetzlosen der Leere.

languages.text: Malheureusement, les habitants de ce monde se composaient principalement de nobles bien nés et de très peu de serfs. Comme les aristocrates ne voulaient pas se salir les mains avec de la basse besogne, ils se mirent à acheter des prisonniers aux pirates. Bientôt, la Nouvelle Rykad devint le refuge privilégié des hors-la-loi du vide.
languages.original_text: Sadly, the world's inhabitants mostly consisted of high-born nobles, with very few serfs. Not willing to sully their hands with manual labour, the aristocrats started buying up pirate captives. Soon, New Rykad became the favoured safe haven for void outlaws.

traits.locale_text: Malheureusement, les habitants de ce monde se composaient principalement de nobles bien nés et de très peu de serfs. Comme les aristocrates ne voulaient pas se salir les mains avec de la basse besogne, ils se mirent à acheter des prisonniers aux pirates. Bientôt, la Nouvelle Rykad devint le refuge privilégié des hors-la-loi du vide.

languages.text: Por desgracia, los habitantes del mundo eran principalmente nobles de alta alcurnia y una cantidad mínima de siervos. El rechazo de los aristócratas a ensuciarse las manos con el trabajo manual les llevó a comprar prisioneros a los piratas, y Nueva Rykad no tardó en convertirse el refugio predilecto para los forajidos del vacío.
languages.original_text: Sadly, the world's inhabitants mostly consisted of high-born nobles, with very few serfs. Not willing to sully their hands with manual labour, the aristocrats started buying up pirate captives. Soon, New Rykad became the favoured safe haven for void outlaws.

traits.locale_text: Por desgracia, los habitantes del mundo eran principalmente nobles de alta alcurnia y una cantidad mínima de siervos. El rechazo de los aristócratas a ensuciarse las manos con el trabajo manual les llevó a comprar prisioneros a los piratas, y Nueva Rykad no tardó en convertirse el refugio predilecto para los forajidos del vacío.

languages.text: 悲しいことに、この世界の住民の大半は貴族であり、農奴はほとんどいなかった。肉体労働で手を汚すことを嫌った貴族たちは、海賊の捕虜を買い占め始めた。やがて、ニュー・ライカドは無法者たちの安住の地として支持されるようになった。
languages.original_text: Sadly, the world's inhabitants mostly consisted of high-born nobles, with very few serfs. Not willing to sully their hands with manual labour, the aristocrats started buying up pirate captives. Soon, New Rykad became the favoured safe haven for void outlaws.

traits.locale_text: 悲しいことに、この世界の住民の大半は貴族であり、農奴はほとんどいなかった。肉体労働で手を汚すことを嫌った貴族たちは、海賊の捕虜を買い占め始めた。やがて、ニュー・ライカドは無法者たちの安住の地として支持されるようになった。

languages.text: Ne yazık ki dünyada yaşayanların çoğunluğu, önemli ailelerden gelen soylulardı ve az sayıda köle vardı. Ellerini ağır işlerle kirletmek istemeyen aristokratlar, korsan tutsaklar satın almaya başladı. Yeni Rykad, kısa süre içinde uçsuz kanunsuzlarının güvenli limanlarından oldu.
languages.original_text: Sadly, the world's inhabitants mostly consisted of high-born nobles, with very few serfs. Not willing to sully their hands with manual labour, the aristocrats started buying up pirate captives. Soon, New Rykad became the favoured safe haven for void outlaws.

traits.locale_text: Ne yazık ki dünyada yaşayanların çoğunluğu önemli ailelerden gelen soylulardı ve az sayıda köle vardı. Ellerini ağır işlerle kirletmek istemeyen aristokratlar korsan tutsaklar satın almaya başladılar. Yeni Rykad kısa süre içinde uçsuz kaçakları için güvenli bir liman hâline dönüştü.
